'''Mythcon 21''' was the twenty-first annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference. 

*'''Theme:''' "Aspects of Love in Fantasy"
*'''Guests of Honor:''' Diana L. Paxson (fantasy author and musician) and [[Patrick Wynne]] (fantasy artist and Tolkien linguist)
*'''Chairman:''' Jo Alida Wilcox
*'''Coordinator:''' Bill Welden
